description:
After a landslide causes a stone wall to collapse, Hakumei tries to lend a helping hand. Will Hakumei’s hard work and dedication get her noticed?
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Kumiai no Genba to Ooiwa to Kai Ishi
The Association`s Work Site / Large Stones and Joint Stones
組合の現場 と 大岩と飼い石
